amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the term "cybersecurity risk" does not apply to actions solely involving violations of consumer terms of service or consumer licensing agreements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to clarify that the term "cybersecurity risk" does not apply to actions solely involving violations of consumer terms of service or consumer licensing agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Langevin.
